title: Pentagon-Anthropic Standoff Is a Decisive Moment for How A.I. Will Be Used in War

summary: The A.I. firm had rejected military officials’ latest offer. Anthropic has until 5:01 p.m. on Friday to give them unrestricted access to its model.

summary: The political class is worried about the historic drop. But the biggest change is among the youngest women, who are the least ready to have children.

summary: There is good news buried behind the worries about population decline, some experts say.

summary: For 60 years, Charles FitzGerald has helped make the East Village an emblem of New York City’s counterculture.

summary: The disabled man had been released from jail when federal officers showed up and drove him to a coffee shop. His family searched for him for days.

summary: A federal judge must decide whether she will approve the request. Prosecutors cited a pattern of intimidation against witnesses as a reason for dropping some of the charges in the sex-trafficking trial.

summary: The megabillionaire was tied to about 90 companies in the state, which he uses for everything from paying nannies to buying land to supporting Donald Trump’s re-election, according to a Times examination.

summary: The airstrikes came hours after Afghan troops had attacked Pakistani border positions and follow months of worsening relations between the neighboring countries.
